Description: Fragment of oval handlle to sharpish turn of Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Rectangular stamp. Clay fine pink-buff; cream slip.
Production date: 200BC (see N. Badoud, Le temps de Rhodes (2015) 142.)
Curator's comments: Name Klearchos. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 71, 31. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 473.37.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0743)
